类的使用
javax.servlet.jsp.JspContext

  • 使用JspContext的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    javax.servlet.jsp
    Classes and interfaces for the Core JSP 2.0 API.
    javax.servlet.jsp.tagext
    Classes and interfaces for the definition of JavaServer Pages Tag Libraries.
    org.apache.jasper.runtime  

    • javax.servlet.jsp中JspContext的使用

      javax.servlet.jsp中JspContext的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  PageContext
      PageContext extends JspContext to provide useful context information for when JSP technology is used in a Servlet environment.

    • javax.servlet.jsp.tagext中JspContext的使用

      返回JspContext的javax.servlet.jsp.tagext中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected JspContext SimpleTagSupport.getJspContext()
      Returns the page context passed in by the container via setJspContext.
      abstract JspContext JspFragment.getJspContext()
      Returns the JspContext that is bound to this JspFragment.
      参数类型为JspContext的javax.servlet.jsp.tagext中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void SimpleTagSupport.setJspContext(JspContext pc)
      Stores the provided JSP context in the private jspContext field.
      void SimpleTag.setJspContext(JspContext pc)
      Called by the container to provide this tag handler with the JspContext for this invocation.

    • org.apache.jasper.runtime中JspContext的使用

      org.apache.jasper.runtime中JspContext的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  JspContextWrapper
      Implementation of a JSP Context Wrapper.
      class  PageContextImpl
      Implementation of the PageContext class from the JSP spec.
      声明为JspContext的org.apache.jasper.runtime中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected JspContext JspFragmentHelper.jspContext 
      返回JspContext的org.apache.jasper.runtime中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      JspContext JspFragmentHelper.getJspContext() 
      参数类型为JspContext的org.apache.jasper.runtime中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ELContextImpl JspApplicationContextImpl.createELContext(JspContext context) 
      参数类型为JspContext的org.apache.jasper.runtime中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      JspContextWrapper(JspContext jspContext, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nestedVars, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> atBeginVars, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> atEndVars, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> aliases) 
      JspFragmentHelper(int discriminator, JspContext jspContext, JspTag parentTag)
